component.name: S3 Bucket Diver
component.summary: Browse and manage S3-compatible storage services

description.p: S3 Bucket Diver is a simple GUI application for browsing and managing S3-compatible storage services. It provides an intuitive interface for connecting to various cloud storage providers and managing your files.

ul.li: Browse and manage files and virtual directories
Search and pagination for large file lists
Export and import credentials as JSON
Drag and drop directories/files directly on the files list

description.p: Tested with Amazon S3, CloudFlare R2, and Oracle Cloud S3 Storage.
Initial release of S3 Bucket Diver
